attributes.action: Drastic price increases outside of school term time.
attributes.additional_details:
If you take your child out in term time when holidays are sometimes up to 50% cheaper you can face a £60 fine. 

If the government have put this law in place, then on long side a law to prevent holiday makers and get always increasing their prices during school holidays should be in place.
attributes.background: Holidays and getaways increase in price drastically during school holidays , if society are now fined to take their children out of school during term time then change the law so the increase in prices is prevented.
